name: Ihsaan Aslam
bio: Ihsaan has always been inspired by cutting edge technology in a variety of engineering fields, but has found that rocketry is a perfect confluence and playground for all the engineering skills required to make rocket flight successful

name: William Lennox
bio: Will has always been inspired by the innovation in the space industry and wants to promote rocketry within Heriot-Watt. Will has a keen interest in aerodynamics and simulations and is excited to push the boundaries of student rocketry.

name: Matthew Roberts
bio: Matthew has various experience in running financial operations in societies and firms, but is particularly keen on creating strong foundations for such an interesting project within the rocketry sector.
